cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence

Class FarmingInfluence<T extends cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.BaseEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.WavePropagationFunction<T>
      • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.WavePropagationWithContext<T>
        • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.FarmingInfluence<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the entity we deal with (creep, hero).
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent.BotFunction<java.lang.Integer,T>, PropagationFunction<T>

    public class FarmingInfluence<T extends cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.BaseEntity>
extends WavePropagationWithContext<T>
    Class that represents farming influence propagation function. This influence goes only towards our agent's base. And it goes up to agent's attack range. It has maximum almost at the end of the attack range.
    Author:
    kocur

      • propagate

        public void propagate(InfluenceLayer l,
                      T e)
        Description copied from class: WavePropagationFunction
        This propagates a passed influence layer. In WPF we spread in a wave-like manner. We decrease distance with each step and we spread the influence accordingly.
        Specified by:
        propagate in interface PropagationFunction<T extends cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.BaseEntity>
